name: Persiandate
body:
### Welcome to Persian Date.
 This library is a prototype for **javascript** Date library.

***
How to Install??

`<script language="javascript" type="text/javascript" src="js/addExt.js"></script>`



### Usage : 
`var d = new Date();`
`d.getPDay();`
`d.getWeekOfYear();`
and so on...
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
